price: 62. « Est-ce toi qui as fait cela à nos divinités, Abraham ? » lui demandèrent-ils.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
